lyric:
[by:龙叔与Doc的旅行日记]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Sam Smith/Jimmy Napes
[00:01.000] 作词 : Sam Smith/Jimmy Napes
[00:13.580] Keep thinkin' that I'm seein' water
[00:16.457] You're playing tricks on me in the sun
[00:20.158] See your shadow in the courtyard
[00:23.215] Stays until the day is done
[00:25.844] The desert don't end, the rain don't fall
[00:29.109] And I can't pretend I don't want you all
[00:32.610] 'Cause I want you all
[00:36.255] You all, you all, you all
[00:39.494] Oh, babe, I really need you
[00:42.888] My feelings gettin' deeper
[00:46.239] My mind is in a free fall
[00:49.459] But there's nothing I can do when it comes to you
[00:53.482] You play with my emotions
[00:56.212] I'm flowin' like the ocean
[00:59.543] I pray for your devotion
[01:02.882] 'Cause there's nothing I can do when it comes to you
[01:07.088] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[01:10.241] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[01:13.885] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[01:16.671] There’s nothing I can do when it comes to you
[01:20.046] Wait a minute, tell me why you're movin' like that
[01:23.070] Na, you wey I choose, but you make it so hard
[01:26.663] I gave you my heart, you're makin' it so dark
[01:30.031] But there's nothing I can do when it comes to you
[01:33.102] You takin' it for granted
[01:36.133] A lot of silence, the river don't end
[01:38.967] 'Cause I want you all, yeah
[01:43.008] You all, you all, you all
[01:46.509] Oh, babe, I really need you
[01:49.404] My feelings gettin' deeper
[01:52.851] My mind is in a free fall
[01:56.416] But there's nothing I can do when it comes to you
[02:00.091] You play with my emotions
[02:02.911] I'm flowin' like the ocean
[02:06.158] I pray for your devotion
[02:09.647] 'Cause there's nothing I can do when it comes to you
[02:13.412] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[02:17.075] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[02:20.467] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[02:23.416] There’s nothing I can do when it comes to you
[02:26.782] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[02:30.508] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[02:33.766] My oa, my oa, my oasis
[02:36.711] There’s nothing I can do when it comes to you
tlyric:
[by:原上巽]
[00:13.580]错以为我看见了水源
[00:16.457]原来是你用阳光动了手脚
[00:20.158]在院子里捕捉到你的身影
[00:23.215]便一直等到深夜
[00:25.844]沙漠无边 也不落雨
[00:29.109]我实在假装不出不渴望你
[00:32.610]因为我全心全意渴望着你
[00:36.255]渴望着你
[00:39.494]宝贝 我实在很需要你
[00:42.888]我的情绪走进深深的阴霾
[00:46.239]我的心情沉重地坠进尘埃
[00:49.459]对你 我无计可施
[00:53.482]你牵动着我的所有情绪
[00:56.212]像浪潮般汹涌澎湃
[00:59.543]祈求着你的垂青
[01:02.882]因为对你 我无计可施
[01:07.088]我的绿洲
[01:10.241]我的绿洲
[01:13.885]我的绿洲
[01:16.671]对你 我无计可施
[01:20.046]等等 请告诉我你为何做出如此举动
[01:23.070]明明是我来选择 但选项如此难取舍
[01:26.663]我为你献上我的真心 你只会给它蒙上一抹暗色
[01:30.031]对你 我无计可施
[01:33.102]你总觉得理所应当
[01:36.133]无止境的沉默 像奔流不止的河
[01:38.967]因为我全心全意渴望着你
[01:43.008]渴望着你
[01:46.509]宝贝 我实在很需要你
[01:49.404]我的情绪走进深深的阴霾
[01:52.851]我的心情沉重地坠进尘埃
[01:56.416]对你 我无计可施
[02:00.091]你牵动着我的所有情绪
[02:02.911]像浪潮般汹涌澎湃
[02:06.158]祈求着你的垂青
[02:09.647]因为对你 我无计可施
[02:13.412]我的绿洲
[02:17.075]我的绿洲
[02:20.467]我的绿洲
[02:23.416]对你 我无计可施
[02:26.782]我的绿洲
[02:30.508]我的绿洲
[02:33.766]我的绿洲
[02:36.711]对你 我无计可施
